On what gaming platform are the tourname.content: The tournaments are played on Pokerstars
The PokerStars client can be downloaded from here: https://www.pokerstars.com/poker/download.

How can I signup to the poker club ?.content: You need to go to the main lobby in PokerStars, then click on the Home Games section
Click on 'Join a poker club', enter the club ID: 488267 together with the invitation code: 'tournament'

When do the tournaments take place ?.content: The tournaments take place every Tuesday and Thursday at 8 PM Romanian Local Time
Sometimes, in the case of special circumstances (holidays etc.), tournaments will be re-scheduled. This will be announced on FileList forum.

Why does it cost so much (20.000 Play-Mo.content: Unfortunately that is the minimum amount possible for such tournaments. Smaller amounts are not possible because of PokerStars policy.

Why didn't I get any points in a tournam.content: There are 2 possible reasons for not receiving points: you were sit-out for more than 15 minutes or you were disqualified for some reason.
